description: Installation of a ventilation duct at rear elevation (Listed Building Consent)
decision_conditions: The development to which this consent relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date on which the consent is granted.

Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, as amended, to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following Equipment Specifications - OC Innovations - OC1 (Odour Control) document, Proposed Ground Floor Plans drawing no.ZDD-W3 9BY: 401,  Proposed Ventilation Duct Layout Ground Floor drawing no.ZDD-W3 9BY : 403, Helios - Gigabox Centrfugal Fans Product Specification Information, Noise Impact assessment report by Venta Acoustics. ref.VA3523.210127.NIA dated 28th January 2021, Kitchen Extraction & Ventilation System Proposal document by Fan Rescue ref: P767875 dated 27th January 2021 and Design and Access Statement by ZD design Ltd - Interior Architecture - Planning Ref.ZDD/W3 9BY/29/01/2021 dated 29th January 2021
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| Any damage to the Listed Building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the works hereby permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: To safeguard the character and historic fabric of the Listed Building, in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - Sections 12 and 16, policy HC1, New London Plan 2019 policy HC1 and policy 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (December 2013).
